title: DOJ Wants SBF's Proposed Expert Witnesses Barred From Testifying at FTX Trial
description: “The defense’s proposed experts suffer from an array of deficiencies that warrant preclusion of all seven witnesses,” said the DOJ.

title: DOJ Requests Courts to ‘Gatekeep Authority’ By Removing SBF’s Expert Witnesses
description: The U.S. DOJ makes a strategic move in the ongoing case against Sam Bankman-Fried with a motion to bar his lineup of expert witnesses.

title: Indian crypto exchange CoinSwitch trims workforce amid market slump
description: CoinSwitch, an Indian cryptocurrency exchange, laid off 44 employees from its customer support team, constituting approximately 7% of its total workforce. The company cited a significant reduction in customer queries and a broader slump in the cryptocurrency market as the primary reasons for the downsizing. Indian crypto exchange CoinSwitch cuts support team in response to ... Read more

title: L2 Wars: Base Sees Explosive Growth, Arbitrum Has Most Active Users
description:
CoinGecko recently released a report on the fastest-growing Layer 2 blockchains, ranked by the highest number of addresses recorded in the shortest span of time. According to the blog, after Base’s official launch on August 9, the platform attracted 1 million unique addresses in just 11 days. Notably, 532k addresses had joined Coinbase’s L2 network […]

The post L2 Wars: Base Sees Explosive Growth, Arbitrum Has Most Active Users appeared first on Coin Edition.
